Download and install went smoothly, except it was in Russian I guess, but gave the option to install in English. Unfortunately, the install continued to read in Russian and I unchecked things which seemed to be standard questions i usually say "no" to like "desktop shortcut" because those checkboxes seemed to be appearing in those kinds of locations during the installation. Because it came with direct x installs and other things, I also kept unchecking the preselected boxes for things which seemed to be wanting permission for that, because I have had problems in the past with old games .. and new ones.. wanting to install different versions of direct x and other elements even though I am up to date and then conflicts happen and I don't need to have so many versions of everything. Once, I had 7 different versions of direct x installed on my pc all from different games.

So here is the problem: When I try to run it, a popup says "The procedure point GetFileInformationByHandleEx could not be located in the dynamic link library KERNEL32.dll.

I doubt it has to do with the two checkboxes I unchecked from their default condition of being selected, but if so, which one should I select (the Russian language if printed here, I can read and compare to the Russian on the install window)

Or, if it is due to something else, what would it be?
